name: Hotel R'n'R - Rockstar Simulator
summary:
🎸 Live the rockstar lifestyle 

In a sandbox of physics-based demolition, with time to explore and plan your strategy before lighting the fireworks and doing your best to keep the Hotel Manager out!

🥊 40+ Weapons

Pressure from hotel staff and your own limp wrists are against you, but with over 40 weapons and 20+ upgrades, there is a World Tour ahead of you, it’s time to get creative.
